info.name: ViBeStock API
info.description:
## Use the ViBeStockAPI to manage your inventory and its expiration dates.

Create an account on **ViBeStockAPI** and start adding your products. We will add a status to your products, based on the expiration date, so you can keep track of them.

| Status | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Usable | The product is still usable, the expiration date is not yet close |
| To expire | The product is about to expire, but is still usable |
| Expired | The product has expired, it should no longer be used or consumed |

**ViBeStockAPI** allows you to create expiration alerts, with it you will indicate how many days before the expiration date we will notify you via email. By default we generate alerts at 10 and 5 days before the product expires.

**ViBeStockAPI** also sends an alerts right on expiration day, so you can keep that in mind.

When you consult the information of your products, we will indicate you how many days are left to expire or how many days it has expired

---

### Authentication

Services are protected, to authenticate a user, you need to generate a token and add it in the headers.

| **Header Key** | Header Value |
| --- | --- |
| Authorization | Token {{generated_token}} |

---

Contact Support:

Name: Erick ViBe

Email: [sergio.erick.vicencio.benitez@gmail.com](https://mailto:sergio.erick.vicencio.benitez@gmail.com)

Personal GitHub: [https://github.com/Erick-ViBe](https://github.com/Erick-ViBe)

---

GitHub Repository: [https://github.com/Erick-ViBe/ViBeStock](https://github.com/Erick-ViBe/ViBeStock)

item.name: Users

request.description:
Create a **User** inside **ViBeStock** with an email and password

- Password - must be contain at least 8 characters

Failure Short Password

item.description:
It is necessary to create a **User** to add products, as these will be linked to it, and the alerts will be sent.

To create and **User** we only need an email and a password

The **Products** and **Expiration** **Alerts** services will require you to be authenticated with your **User** to acess them

item.name: Products

request.description:
### Add Product

This will allow you to add a **product.** When adding a **product**, we will generate a status and update the days to expire or expired days.

You will also be alerted via email 10 and 5 days before expiration and on the day the product expires.

query.description: Use name, stock or expiration_date to ordering the results.

Filter by expiration date before this date
Filter by product status

item.description:
To manage your inventory, you can add **products** to ViBeStock to have the information about them at all times.

| Product field | Detail |
| --- | --- |
| Name | Product name |
| Description | Product description |
| Stock | Quantity of product held |
| Status | Status based on the expiration date, so you can keep track of them |
| Expiration date | Date on which the product is no longer usable/consumable |
| Days to expire | Days before the product is no longer usable/consumable |
| Expired days | Days since the product is no usable/consumable |

item.name: Expiration Alerts

response.name: Failure Trying to Create Default Expiration Alert
Failure Trying to Create Existing Expiration Alert

item.description: In **ViBeStock** you can create **expiration alerts** so that we will alert you via email when your product expires. You just need to tell us how many days before the **product** expires you want to be alerted.
